attributes.action: change the law on learning to drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like to see a minimum of at least 10 driving lessons with an approved driving instructor before they are allowed to practice with friends and family to try and reduce road casualties upon our roads and making driving safer for all who use them a document would be signed by the instructor to verify that this has been completed allowing them private practice as well as professional tuition. Sunderland Assocation of Driving Instructors (SADI)
